    print("hello world!")

    \( g^\prime(t) = \displaystyle\frac{d}{dt}f(A,B) = \frac{\partial}{\partial A}f(A,B)\frac{dA}{dt} + \frac{\partial}{\partial B}f(A,B)\frac{dB}{dt} \)
